#summary MF/HF to 100MHz Upconverter

PAGE UNDER CONSTRUCTION

  The design files can be found in [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/source/browse/trunk/Current_Designs/Upconverter/ SVN].

  Converts signals in the 0.1MHz to 60MHz range to signals in the 100.1MHz to 160MHz range.  Intended for use in receiver applications with project like the FunCube Dongle and RTL-SDR.
